Uses of Class
tripleplay.game.ScreenSpace.Screen

  • Packages that use ScreenSpace.Screen 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.game  

    • Uses of ScreenSpace.Screen in tripleplay.game

      Subclasses of ScreenSpace.Screen in tripleplay.game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ScreenSpace.UIScreen
      A ScreenSpace.Screen that takes care of basic UI setup for you.
      Methods in tripleplay.game that return ScreenSpace.Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScreenSpace.Screen ScreenSpace.bottom()
      Returns the lowest screen in the stack.
      ScreenSpace.Screen ScreenSpace.current()
      Returns the current screen, or null if this space is empty.
      ScreenSpace.Screen ScreenSpace.focus()
      Returns the currently focused screen.
      ScreenSpace.Screen ScreenSpace.screen(int index)
      Returns the screen at index.
      ScreenSpace.Screen ScreenSpace.target()
      Returns the target screen in the current transition, or null.
      Methods in tripleplay.game that return types with arguments of type ScreenSpace.Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<ScreenSpace.Screen> ScreenSpace.iterator() 
      Methods in tripleplay.game with parameters of type ScreenSpace.Screen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ScreenSpace.add(ScreenSpace.Screen screen, ScreenSpace.Dir dir)
      Adds screen to this space, positioned dir-wise from the current screen.
      void ScreenSpace.Dir.finish(ScreenSpace.Screen oscreen, ScreenSpace.Screen nscreen)
      Cleans up after a transition.
      void ScreenSpace.Dir.init(ScreenSpace.Screen oscreen, ScreenSpace.Screen nscreen)
      Prepares oscreen and nscreen to be transitioned.
      void ScreenSpace.initAdd(ScreenSpace.Screen screen, ScreenSpace.Dir dir)
      Adds screen to this space but does not activate or wake it.
      void ScreenSpace.pop(ScreenSpace.Screen screen)
      Removes screen from this space.
      void ScreenSpace.popTo(ScreenSpace.Screen screen)
      Removes all screens from the space until screen is reached.
      void ScreenSpace.replace(ScreenSpace.Screen screen)
      Adds screen to this space, replacing the current top-level screen.
      abstract void ScreenSpace.Dir.update(ScreenSpace.Screen oscreen, ScreenSpace.Screen nscreen, float pct)
      Updates the position of oscreen and nscreen based on pct.
